sections.name: header
sections.title: Header
sections.description: The header contains the company logo, main site navigation and often a call-to-action button.

sections.name: footer
sections.title: Footer
sections.description: The footer contains secondary site navigation.

data.description: Blog page for a site built with the Corporate Tailwind Built.js Theme.

sections.name: blogTeaser
sections.title: Blog Teaser
sections.description: A set of blog items on the Home page.

sections.name: blogLanding
sections.title: Blog Landing
sections.description: The blog page landing area. This area contains the latest published blog post.

sections.name: postList
sections.title: Blog Item List
sections.description: A list of all published blog posts excluding the latest published blog post.

sections.name: blogArticleLanding
sections.title: Blog Article Landing
sections.description: The blog post article page landing section.

sections.name: blogRelatedArticles
sections.title: Blog Related Articles
sections.description: A list of related articles to and excluding the currently viewed article.

templates.name: header1
templates.title: Header 1
templates.description: Simple header with justified logo and nav links.

templates.name: footer1
templates.title: Footer 1
templates.description: Simple footer with centered content and social links.

templates.name: seo
templates.title: SEO
templates.description: Define SEO meta titles, meta descriptions and social media meta data.

templates.name: list1
templates.title: List 1
templates.description: List item with two offset columns and split content.

templates.name: list2
templates.title: List 2
templates.description: List of items with three equal columns, left aligned content and an image.
